messages.subject: Uesugi Kenshin exhibit
messages.msgSnippet: The Niigata Prefectural Museum of History s current special exhibit focuses on the life and career of Uesugi Kenshin.  The exhibit runs through Oct. 20 until
messages.messageBody:
The Niigata Prefectural Museum of History's current special exhibit
focuses on the life and career of Uesugi Kenshin. The exhibit runs
through Oct. 20 until Dec. 2, 2001. You can see some of the displays
at

http://www.nbz.or.jp/eng/uesugi03.htm

Feel free to leave comments at

http://www.nbz.or.jp/scripts/wwwboard/index.html

Best, MEH
